Package me.itzloghotxd.configsystem.config

Class ConfigManager

java.lang.Object
me.itzloghotxd.configsystem.config.ConfigManager
public class ConfigManager extends Object
ConfigManager is responsible for managing multiple configuration files. It provides methods to load, save, reload, and get configurations.
